messages.title: LibDems are the Party of 'Remain'
messages.content: Sometimes, we have been sworn at, abused, harangued, jostled and even threatened by some who cannot explain why they support Brexit. We do not retaliate, but we stand our ground. LibDems are internationalists, believing in liberty, equality, community and environmentalism. We stand by our Liberal principles. We want to work, study and share our lives with our European neighbours and friends as part of our common Europe. 'Europe is the Future'. It's our children's future.

keyPolicies.policyDescription: Supporting remaining in the European Union and fostering close ties with European neighbours, based on liberal principles of liberty, equality, community, and environmentalism.

issues.brexitEurope: LibDems are the Party of 'Remain'. We stand by our Liberal principles. We want to work, study and share our lives with our European neighbours and friends as part of our common Europe.

quotes.text: A VOTE FOR THE LIBERAL DEMOCRATS IS A VOTE TO STOP BREXIT
